alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:03AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, northeastern Onslow and Carteret Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 403 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Silverdale to Morehead City. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, Piney Green, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Marshallberg, Smyrna, Merrimon, Straits, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe and Silverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
